sect2.title: Indent-Action
sect2.para: The Indent-Action does code-indention based on its options.

para.literallayout: The option useSpaces specifies if spaces should be used or if false, tabs are used. The option tabWidth specifies the width of a tab in spaces. The option indentionWidth specifies how much a normal indention is. The option initialIdentionWidth specifies the depth all code is indented.
